Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pool

  • public class Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the representation of the object in which the faculty will be dropped into A pool is considered a dunk tank. It contains an image for the the tank as well as x and y positions coordinates. This class also contains functions for getting the top and bottom of the tanks that is used to determine faculty position with respect to this object and displaying/playing animations and sounds.
